entries.description: An accelerated toolkit for building mobile apps for news and content

entries.title: Best practices for mobile UI design – part 1
entries.description: Mobile UI design can be challenging, and with the number of games and devices growing at an exponential rate, crafting the most performant game has become a major priority.

entries.title: Building an Android app with GraphQL
entries.description: In this article, we will talk about GraphQL and where it shines over REST, and finally, we will write some code to connect an Android application to a GraphQL server.

entries.title: Google Roadmap: Flutter to Integrate with JavaScript, Wasm
entries.description: Google laid out an ambitious roadmap for its Dart framework, Flutter — including WebAssembly support — at the Flutter Forward conference.

entries.title: Google's experimental ChatGPT rivals include a search bot and a tool called 'Apprentice Bard'
entries.description: "Apprentice bard"? Can I roll a "Novice druid" instead?

entries.title: Kapow! Inflatable space station module blows to pieces in video explosion
entries.description: In space, no one can hear you pop

entries.title: Microsoft will notify you when a new widget is available
entries.description: How can you ignore them if you don't know they exist?

entries.title: My experience with migrating my app from Xamarin.Forms to .NET MAUI
entries.description: I’ve been eager to rewrite some of my personal apps from Xamarin.Forms to .NET MAUI, but since all of them are dependant on map functionality, I had to wait until the arrival of .NET 7, since the .NET 6 release of MAUI didn’t ship with map support.

entries.title: Play Audio and Video in .NET MAUI apps with the new MediaElement
entries.description: With MediaElement you can easily play audio and video from within your .NET MAUI app, in this post you’ll learn everything you need to know about this first version and the plans we have for the future!
